# Spells (Alphabetical List - D)
## Da-De
**[[Dagger Swarm (Spell)|Dagger Swarm]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Enchant a swarm of daggers to attack your foes.

**[[Dagger Swarm, Greater (Spell)|Dagger Swarm, Greater]]****:** Enchant a swarm of daggers to attack your foes, swarm can flank and sneak attack.

**Daggermark's Exchange:** Transmute one poison into another of equal or lesser value.

**[[Daggerspell Stance (Spell)|Daggerspell Stance]]****:** You gain +2 insight bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls if you make a full attack, SR 5 + 

**[[Daggerspell Stance, Greater (Spell)|Daggerspell Stance, Greater]]****:** You gain +3 insight bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls if you make a full attack, SR 10 + 

**Dahak's Release:** You unleash all the target’s anger and destructive urges, causing it to fly into a violent bloodlust.

**[[Damnation Stride]] <sup>RY</sup>:** As *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]*, except you leave behind a burst of flame.

**[[Damning Darkness (Spell)|Damning Darkness]]****:** Darkness deals either 2d6 or 1d6 damage per round.

**[[Dampen Magic (Spell)|Dampen Magic]]****:** Decrease enhancement bonus of magic weapons as well as save DC 

     and caster level of magical effects used against subject by 1 or more points; subject can invoke a 5-ft.-radius *[[Antimagic Field (Spell)|antimagic field]]*.

**[[Dance of a Hundred Cuts (Spell)|Dance of a Hundred Cuts]]****:** Gain +1 combat bonus/3 levels. 

**[[Dance of a Thousand Cuts (Spell)|Dance of a Thousand Cuts]]****:** As *[[Dance of a Hundred Cuts (Spell)|dance of a hundred cuts]]*, plus the benefits of *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]*.

**[[Dance of Ruin (Spell)|Dance of Ruin]]****:** Nondemons take 2d20 damage.

**[[Dance of the Unicorn (Spell)|Dance of the Unicorn]]****:** Purifying mist washes the air clean of smoke, dust, and poisons.

**[[Dancing Blade (Spell)|Dancing Blade]]****:** Target sword fights independently.

**[[Dancing Chains (Spell)|Dancing Chains]]****:** Animates one chain per level.

**[[Dancing Daggers (Spell)|Dancing Daggers]]****:** Creates a cloud of tiny blades that inflict 1d4 points of damage per round.

**Dancing Darkness**: Create four spheres of floating darkness.

**[[Dancing Dragonmark (Spell)|Dancing Dragonmark]]****:** One dragonmarked creature/level is [[Nauseated|nauseated]].

**[[Dancing Lantern (Spell)|Dancing Lantern]]****:** Animates a lantern that follows you.

**[[Dancing Lights (Spell)|Dancing Lights]]****:** Creates torches or other lights.

**[[Dancing Weapon (Spell)|Dancing Weapon]]****:** A weapon attacks on its own.

**[[Dancing Web (Spell)|Dancing Web]]****:** Energy strands deal 1d6 nonlethal damage per level plus entangles evil creatures for 1d6 rounds.

**[[Dark Tide (Spell)|Dark Tide]]****:** Infuse water over a large area with negative energy, causing weakness and 1d6 damage/hour.

**[[Dark Way (Spell)|Dark Way]]****:** Creates temporary unbreakable bridge supporting up to 200 lb./level.

**Dark Whispers:** Whisper through the shadows.

**[[Darkbolt (Spell)|Darkbolt]]****:** Deals 1d8 damage/2 levels and stuns 1 round.

**[[Darkflame Arrow (Spell)|Darkflame Arrow]]****:** Masterwork arrow or bolt deals normal damage plus 2d6 damage each round for 3 rounds.

**[[Darklight (Spell)|Darklight]]****:** Creates 5-ft.-radius area where all can see without light.

**[[Darklight, Greater (Spell)|Darklight, Greater]]****:** Creates 5-ft.-radius/level area where the tareget can see without light.

**[[Darkness (Spell)|Darkness]]****:** 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.

**Darkvault:** Ward shadows so light cannot penetrate them.

**[[Darkvision (Spell)|Darkvision]]****:** See 60 ft. in total darkness.

**Darkvision, Communal:** As *[[Darkvision (Spell)|darkvision]]*, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

**[[Darkvision, Greater (Spell)|Darkvision, Greater]]****:** See 120 ft. in total darkness.

**[[Darkvision, Mass (Spell)|Darkvision, Mass]]****:** As *[[Darkvision (Spell)|darkvision]]*, but affects one/level subjects.

**[[Darkvision, Superior (Spell)|Darkvision, Superior]]****:** Gain darkvision with no range limitation.

**Darting Duplicate:** Summon a duplicate of yourself to provoke enemy attacks of opportunity.

**[[Darts of Life (Spell)|Darts of Life]]****:** Create ten projectiles that you can launch at allies to cure 1d8 points of damage each.

**[[Dawn (Spell)|Dawn]]****:** Sleeping/unconscious creatures in area awaken.

**[[Dawn Burst (Spell)|Dawn Burst]]****:** Illuminate all creatures in 10-foot-radius; deal damage to light-sensitive creatures.

**[[Dawn Shroud (Spell)|Dawn Shroud]]****:** Cause the target to glow with the rosy light of dawn.

**Daybreak Arrow:** Targeted ammunition exudes radiant energy.

**[[Daylight (Spell)|Daylight]]****:** 60-ft. radius of bright light.

**Daywalker:** Reshape an undead creature to appear living.

**[[Daze (Spell)|Daze]]****:** Humanoid creature of 4 HD or less loses next action.

**Daze, Mass:** As *[[Daze (Spell)|daze]]*, but affecting multiple creatures.

**[[Daze Monster (Spell)|Daze Monster]]****:** Living creature of 6 HD or less loses next action.

**[[Dead End (Spell)|Dead End]]****:** Removes spoor of one creature/level.

**[[Dead Light (Spell)|Dead Light]]****:** Create a mote of light that illuminates a 30 feet radius but which is only visible by arcane means 

     such as *[[Arcane Eye (Spell)|arcane eye]]**,* *[[Arcane Sight (Spell)|arcane sight]]**,* *[[Arcane Sight, Greater (Spell)|greater arcane sight]]*, or *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]*.

**Deadeye’s Lore:** Gain a +4 bonus on [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]] and move full speed while tracking.

**[[Deadfall (Spell)|Deadfall]]****:** Falling wood causes damage and knocks foes prone.

**[[Deadly Finale (Spell)|Deadly Finale]]****:** Deals 2d8 damage to multiple targets.

**[[Deadly Juggernaut (Spell)|Deadly Juggernaut]]****:** Your might increases with every kill you make.

**[[Deadly Lahar (Spell)|Deadly Lahar]]****:** Create a wave of molten volcanic rock that sticks to creatures.

**[[Deadly Sunstroke (Spell)|Deadly Sunstroke]]****:** Creatures take 1d6 fire damage/level and become [[Fatigued|fatigued]].

**[[Deadly Weapons (Spell)|Deadly Weapons]]****:** Target's equipped weapon gains +1 weapon dice multiplier.

**[[Deadman's Contingency (Spell)|Deadman’s Contingency]]****:** Set one of a list of contingencies for your demise.

**[[Deafening Blast (Spell)|Deafening Blast]]****:** Permanently deafen all targets in 20-foot-radius spread.

**[[Deafening Clang (Spell)|Deafening Clang]]****:** Weapon deals sonic damage, deafens.

**[[Deafening Song Bolt (Spell)|Deafening Song Bolt]]****:** Blast of song deals 3d10 damage and deafens targets.

**[[Death Armor (Spell)|Death Armor]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Black aura damages creatures attacking you.

**[[Death by Thorns (Spell)|Death by Thorns]]****:** Up to three creatures die in 1d4 rounds or are incapacitated, taking 4d6 damage.

**[[Death Candle (Spell)|Death Candle]]** **<sup>R</sup>:** Create a howling [[Elemental, Fire (Bestiary PF1)|fire elemental]] from the remains of the target’s life energy.

**[[Death Dragon (Spell)|Death Dragon]]****:** You gain +4 natural armor, +4 deflection, and natural attacks.

**[[Death From Above (Spell)|Death From Above]]****:** Target gains +30 enhancement bonus to [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] and land speed, can leap and take full attack.

**[[Death From Below (Spell)|Death from Below]]** **<sup>R</sup>:** Target gains dodge bonus to AC against larger creatures.

**[[Death Grimace (Spell)|Death Grimace]]****:** Caster leaves magical “calling card” on a corpse.

**[[Death Hail (Spell)|Death Hail]]****:** Summons a storm of death hail.

**[[Death Is Me (Spell)|Death is Me]]****:** Exchange features with a dead creature.

**[[Death Knell (Spell)|Death Knell]]** **<sup>Y</sup>:** Kills dying creature; you gain 1d8 temporary hp, +2 to Str, and +1 caster level.

**[[Death Lock (Spell)|Death Lock]]****:** Target cannot become a ghost and goes to the True Afterlife if killed.

**[[Death Throes (Spell)|Death Throes]]****:** Your body explodes when you die.

**[[Death Ward (Spell)|Death Ward]]****:** Grants bonuses against death spells and negative energy.

**[[Death Ward, Mass (Spell)|Death Ward, Mass]]****:** As *[[Death Ward (Spell)|death ward]]*, but more subjects.

**[[Deathless (Spell)|Deathless]]** **<sup>Y</sup>:** Prevent death from hit point damage so long as this spell persists.

**[[Deathsight (Spell)|Deathsight]]****:** Make death attack without spending rounds in observation.

**[[Deathwatch (Spell)|Deathwatch]]****:** Reveals how near death subjects within 30 ft. are.

**Deathwine:** Turn a potion into a pool of necromantic energy.

**[[Death's Boon (Spell)|Death's Boon]]****:** As *[[Death's Favor (Spell)|death's favor]]*, except all single target damage up to 10 points per level (150 points maximum) is duplicated.

**[[Death's Call (Spell)|Death's Call]]****:** Scream deals 1 point of damage/level (more to swarms), fatigues all within 10 feet.

**[[Death's Favor (Spell)|Death's Favor]]****:** All single-target damage up to 15 points per level (300 points max.) dealt to the caster is duplicated against the attacker.

**[[Decapitating Scarf (Spell)|Decapitating Scarf]]****:** Ranged attack decapitates target or deals 1d4 damage/level (max 20d4).

**[[Decastave (Spell)|Decastave]]****:** Conjure a quarterstaff of force.

**Deceitful Veneer:** Make someone seem like an obvious liar.

**[[Deceptive Facade (Spell)|Deceptive Facade]]****:** Disguise appearance of another creature or object.

**[[Deceptive Redundancy]]:** Protect your magic from attempts to dispel it.

**Decollate:** Target can safely remove its head

**Decompose Corpse:** Turn corpse into clean skeleton.

**[[Decomposition (Spell)|Decomposition]]****:** Wounds deal 3 extra points of damage each round.

**[[Decoy Image (Spell)|Decoy Image]]****:** Figment mimics you and allies.

**[[Deep Breath (Spell)|Deep Breath]]****:** Your lungs are filled with air.

**[[Deep Freeze (Spell)|Deep Freeze]]****:** Creature touched gradually freezes into a block of ice.

**[[Deep Slumber (Spell)|Deep Slumber]]****:** Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.

**[[Deeper Darkness (Spell)|Deeper Darkness]]****:** Object sheds shadows in 60-ft. radius.

**[[Deeper Darkvision (Spell)|Deeper Darkvision]]****:** Subject can see 90 ft. in magical darkness.

**[[Deepsong (Spell)|Deepsong]]****:** You attune your mind so you can experience the *deepsong*.

**[[Defending Bone (Spell)|Defending Bone]]****:** You gain damage reduction 5/bludgeoning.

**[[Defending Bone, Greater (Spell)|Defending Bone, Greater]]****:** As *[[Defending Bone (Spell)|defending bone]]**,* but with longer duration.

**[[Defenestrating Sphere (Spell)|Defenestrating Sphere]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Cloudy gray sphere knocks enemies prone, hurls them upward for subsequent falling damage.

**[[Defensive Grace (Spell)|Defensive Grace]]****:** Roll an inspiration die without expending a use of inspiration.

**Defensive Shock:** Electricity damages your attackers.

**[[Defile Armor (Spell)|Defile Armor]]****:** As *sanctify armor*, but gain DR 5/good when using judgment or smite.

**[[Defile Snow and Ice (Spell)|Defile Snow and Ice]]****:** Grants undead a +4 profane bonus against turning and cold creatures SR 15 against fire spells.

**[[Deflect (Spell)|Deflect]]****:** Gain bonus to AC for one attack.

**[[Deflect, Greater (Spell)|Deflect, Greater]]****:** As *[[Deflect, Lesser (Spell)|lesser deflect]]*, except that you gain a shield bonus to AC equal to your caster level which lasts longer.

**[[Deflect, Lesser (Spell)|Deflect, Lesser]]****:** Gain a deflection bonus of +1/3 levels (max +5) against one attack.

**[[Deflection (Spell)|Deflection]]****:** Attacks that miss are redirected back to the source of the attack.

**[[Dehydrate (Spell)|Dehydrate]]****:** Deals Con damage to target.

**[[Deific Bastion (Spell)|Deific Bastion]]****:** Your shield or armor gains a +1 enhancement bonus plus a special ability that varies by deity.

**[[Deific Vengeance (Spell)|Deific Vengeance]]****:** Deity’s punishment deals 1d6 damage/2 levels (max 5d6).

**[[Delay Death (Spell)|Delay Death]]****:** Losing hit points doesn’t kill subject.

**[[Delay Disease (Spell)|Delay Disease]]** **<sup>R</sup>:** Grant the target temporary immunity to disease.

**[[Delay Image (Spell)|Delay Image]]****:** +2 to AC, +1 to saves against direct magical attacks.

**[[Delay Manifestation (Spell)|Delay Manifestation]]****:** Delays creature from manifesting as a ghost if killed.

**Delay Pain:** Ignore pain for 1 hour/level.

**[[Delay Poison (Spell)|Delay Poison]]****:** Stops poison from harming target for 1 hour/level.

**Delay Poison, Communal:** As *[[Delay Poison (Spell)|delay poison]]*, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

**[[Delay Teleportation (Spell)|Delay Teleportation]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Delay the departure of creatures teleporting out the affected area by 1 round.

**[[Delay Teleportation, Greater (Spell)|Delay Teleportation, Greater]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Delay the departure of creatures teleporting out the affected area by 3 rounds.

**[[Delay Teleportation, Lesser (Spell)|Delay Teleportation, Lesser]]****:** Teleportation spell is suspended for 1 round/3 levels.

**[[Delayed Blast Fireball (Spell)|Delayed Blast Fireball]]****:** 1d6/level fire damage; you can postpone blast for up to 5 rounds.

**[[Delayed Consumption (Spell)|Delayed Consumption]]****:** Extract doesn’t come into effect until you want it to.

**[[Delayed Resurrection (Spell)|Delayed Resurrection]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Deity brings subject back from the dead automatically.

**[[Deliquescence (Spell)|Deliquescence]]****:** As *[[Transmute Rock to Mud (Spell)|transmute rock to mud]]*, except it transforms ice to cold water.

**Delusional Pride:** Target is penalized on attacks and checks but gains bonus against charms and compulsions.

**[[Delusions of Grandeur (Spell)|Delusions of Grandeur]]****:** Subject thinks it is better than it is.

**[[Demand (Spell)|Demand]]****:** As *[[Sending (Spell)|sending]]*, plus you can send *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*.

**Demand Offering:** Make a creature give you an object it’s holding.

**[[Demon Dirge (Spell)|Demon Dirge]]****:** Demons are [[Stunned|stunned]] and take 3d6 damage/round for 1d4 rounds.

**[[Demon Wings (Spell)|Demon Wings]]****:** Caster flies at his land speed.

**[[Demoncall (Spell)|Demoncall]]****:** Caster gains +10 on one [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (the planes), [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (arcana), or [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (religion) check.

**[[Demonflesh (Spell)|Demonflesh]]****:** Caster gains +1 natural armor/5 caster levels.

**[[Demonhide (Spell)|Demonhide]]****:** Evil creature gains DR 10/cold iron or good.

**[[Denounce (Spell)|Denounce]]****:** Worsens attitudes toward target creature.

**[[Denouncement (Spell)|Denouncement]]****:** Worsens attitudes toward target creature.

**[[Depthsurge (Spell)|Depthsurge]]****:** Water slam deals 2d6 + caster level damage to all within 20-ft. radius, pushes targets back, sinks ships.

**[[Desecrate (Spell)|Desecrate]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Fills area with negative energy; aids undead.

**[[Desecrate Battlefield (Spell)|Desecrate Battlefield]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Fills large area with negative energy, making undead stronger.

**[[Desert Binding (Spell)|Desert Binding]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Imprisons creature as sand in an hourglass or wind in the waste.

**[[Desert Diversion (Spell)|Desert Diversion]]****:** Those attempting planar travel are diverted to a random wasteland.

**Desperate Weapon:** Create an improvised weapon.

**[[Despoil (Spell)|Despoil]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Kills plants and damages objects in 100-ft./level radius.

**[[Desiccate (Spell)|Desiccate]]****:** Deals 1d6/2 levels dessication damage and dehydrates living creature.

**[[Desiccate, Mass (Spell)|Desiccate, Mass]]****:** Desiccates several creatures.

**[[Desiccating Bubble (Spell)|Desiccating Bubble]]****:** Globe of air damages by evaporating moisture from subject.

**[[Destruction (Spell)|Destruction]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Kills subject and destroys remains.

**[[Destruction of the Angel (Spell)|Destruction of the Angel]]****:** Destroys good outsider or inflicts 10d6 points of damage.

**[[Detect Aberration (Spell)|Detect Aberration]]****:** Reveals presence of aberrations.

**[[Detect Animals or Plants (Spell)|Detect Animals or Plants]]****:** Detects kinds of animals or plants.

**[[Detect Chaos (Spell)|Detect Chaos]]****:** Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

**[[Detect Crossroads (Spell)|Detect Crossroads]]****:** Detect fey crossroads within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Curse (Spell)|Detect Curse]]****:** Detects curses on one person or object.

**[[Detect Dragonblood (Spell)|Detect Dragonblood]]****:** Detect dragons and dragonblooded creatures within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Dragonmark (Spell)|Detect Dragonmark]]****:** Detect and identify dragonmarks within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Evil (Spell)|Detect Evil]]****:** Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

**[[Detect Favored Enemy (Spell)|Detect Favored Enemy]]****:** You know if favored enemies are within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Fire (Spell)|Detect Fire]]****:** Detect fire within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Ghost (Spell)|Detect Ghost]]****:** Reveals ghosts within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Good (Spell)|Detect Good]]****:** Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

**[[Detect Incarnum (Spell)|Detect Incarnum]]****:** Detect soulmelds and essentia within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Law (Spell)|Detect Law]]****:** Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

**[[Detect Magic (Spell)|Detect Magic]]****:** Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Manifest Zone (Spell)|Detect Manifest Zone]]****:**You can sense the presence of manifest zones.

**[[Detect Metal and Minerals (Spell)|Detect Metal and Minerals]]****:** You can detect large accumulations of metals and other minerals, whether worked or unworked.

**[[Detect Poison (Spell)|Detect Poison]]****:** Detects poison in a creature or object.

**[[Detect Scrying (Spell)|Detect Scrying]]****:** Alerts you to magical eavesdropping.

**[[Detect Secret Doors (Spell)|Detect Secret Doors]]****:** Reveals hidden doors within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Ship (Spell)|Detect Ship]]****:** Detect and identify ships.

**[[Detect Snares and Pits (Spell)|Detect Snares and Pits]]****:** Reveals natural or primitive traps.

**[[Detect Taint (Spell)|Detect Taint]]****:** Reveals creatures or objects with taint.

**Detect the Faithful:** Find others of the same faith.

**[[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|Detect Thoughts]]****:** Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

**[[Detect Undead (Spell)|Detect Undead]]****:** Reveals undead within 60 ft.

**[[Detect Weaponry (Spell)|Detect Weaponry]]****:** Reveals weapons within 60 feet.

**[[Determine Causality (Spell)|Determine Causality]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Influence the outcome of a random event favorably.

**[[Detonate (Spell)|Detonate]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Inflicts 1d8/level energy damage to all creatures within 15 ft.

**[[Detonation (Spell)|Detonation]]****:** Slays subject and creates 20-ft.-radius explosion that deals 1d6 damage/level (max 20d6).

**[[Remove Venom (Spell)|Remove Venom]]****:** Neutralize poison in 30-ft. radius.

**[[Devastate Undead (Spell)|Devastate Undead]]****:** Destroy undead as if hit by a disrupting weapon.

**[[Devastating Smite (Spell)|Devastating Smite]]****:** Double the extra damage dealt by your next smite attack.

**[[Devil Blight (Spell)|Devil Blight]]****:** Damage and stun baatezu; damage other lawful and evil creatures.

**Devil Snare <sup>M</sup>:** Create an invisible circle to trap outsiders.

**[[Devil's Ego (Spell)|Devil’s Ego]]****:** Caster gains 1d4+1 Cha and become an outsider.

**[[Devil's Eye (Spell)|Devil’s Eye]]****:** Caster can see in even magical darkness, up to 30 ft.

**[[Devil's Tail (Spell)|Devil’s Tail]]****:** Caster gains a spiked tail that deals 1d4 damage.

**[[Devil's Tongue (Spell)|Devil’s Tongue]]****:** Tongue grapples with reach 15 ft.

**[[Devil's Tower (Spell)|Devil’s Tower]]****:** Conjures a fortified dwelling.

**[[Devolution (Spell)|Devolution]]****:** An eidolon temporarily loses 1 evolution +1/five levels.

**Debilitating Portent:** Inflicts an ill fate on a creature, halving its damage when it attacks or casts a spell.

## Df-Dj
**Diagnose Disease:** Detect and identify diseases.

**[[Diamond Blast (Spell)|Diamond Blast]] <sup>M</sup>:** Dazzles evil creatures for 2d6 rounds and deals 1d6 damage per level (maximum 10d6) to evil creatures.

**[[Diamondsteel (Spell)|Diamondsteel]] <sup>M</sup>:** Metal armor provides [[S3.1D-F - Universal Monster Rules D-F (Bestiary 6 Apx)|damage reduction]].

**[[Dictum (Spell)|Dictum]]****:** Kills, paralyzes, staggers, or deafens nonlawful targets.

**Die for Your Master:** A stronger version of *bleed for your master*, this forces the animal servant to intercept any attack that targets you, even if it does not require an attack roll.

**[[Dimension Door (Spell)|Dimension Door]]****:** Teleports you a short distance.

**[[Dimension Door, Greater (Spell)|Dimension Door, Greater]]****:** Short-range, multiple-use *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]*.

**[[Dimension Hop (Spell)|Dimension Hop]]****:** Teleport subject short distance.

**[[Dimension Jumper (Spell)|Dimension Jumper]]****:** Teleport yourself up to 30 feet once per round.

**[[Dimension Jumper, Greater (Spell)|Dimension Jumper, Greater]]****:** Teleport yourself up to 60 feet once per round.

**[[Dimension Leap (Spell)|Dimension Leap]]****:** Teleport 10 ft./level.

**[[Dimension Shuffle (Spell)|Dimension Shuffle]]****:** Teleport multiple creatures short distances within line of sight.

**[[Dimensional Anchor (Spell)|Dimensional Anchor]]****:** Bars extradimensional movement.

**[[Dimensional Bounce (Spell)|Dimensional Bounce]]****:** Teleport multiple times between two designated locations.

**[[Dimensional Lock (Spell)|Dimensional Lock]]****:** Teleportation and interplanar travel blocked for 1 day/level.

**[[Dimensional Stability (Spell)|Dimensional Stability]]****:** Stabilize an extradimensional space.

**[[Dimensional Wormhole (Spell)|Dimensional Wormhole]]****:** Create a permanent one-way conduit between 2 points which allows teleportation between those points 

     even when teleportation might be blocked.

**[[Diminish Breath Weapon (Spell)|Diminish Breath Weapon]]****:** Reduces breath weapon damage by 1 die/level.

**[[Diminish Plants (Spell)|Diminish Plants]]****:** Reduces size or blights the growth of normal plants.

**Diminished Detection:** Reduce the areas of [[Divination Spells|divination spells]] for the purpose of targeting you.

**[[Dinosaur Stampede (Spell)|Dinosaur Stampede]]****:** Spectral dinosaurs deal 1d12 damage +1/level.

**[[Dire Hunger (Spell)|Dire Hunger]]****:** Subject grows fangs, attacks creatures near it.

**[[Dirge (Spell)|Dirge]]****:** Enemies take 2 points of Str and Dex damage/round.

**[[Dirge of Discord (Spell)|Dirge of Discord]]****:** All within 20 ft. take –4 on attack rolls and Dexterity, and reduce speed by 50%.

**[[Disable Construct (Spell)|Disable Construct]]****:** Touch attack makes a construct [[Helpless|helpless]] for 1 round/level.

**[[Discern Bloodline (Spell)|Discern Bloodline]]****:** Know the race of one creature/level.

**[[Discern Lies (Spell)|Discern Lies]]****:** Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

**[[Discern Location (Spell)|Discern Location]]****:** Reveals exact location of creature or object.

**[[Discern Next of Kin (Spell)|Discern Next of Kin]]****:** Read the target’s mind to learn about its family.

**[[Discern Shapechanger (Spell)|Discern Shapechanger]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Penetrates disguises and identifies shapechanging creatures.

**[[Discolor Pool (Spell)|Discolor Pool]]****:** Change the color of a color pool on the [[Astral Plane]].

**[[Discordant Blast (Spell)|Discordant Blast]]****:** 3d6 sonic damage in 10-ft. burst or 30-ft. cone can also [[Bull Rush|bull rush]] creatures.

**[[Discordant Malediction (Spell)|Discordant Malediction]]****:** Subject takes sonic damage each time she casts a spell with a verbal component.

**Discovery Torch:** Touched object emanates bright light, granting [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] and [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] bonuses.

**[[Disdain the Divine (Spell)|Disdain the Divine]]****:** Grants +1 bonus/four levels to saves against divine spells.

**Disfiguring Touch:** Target becomes disfigured.

**[[Disguise Caravan (Spell)|Disguise Caravan]]****:** Disguises a land vehicle (and animals pulling it).

**Disguise Other:** As *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]*, but affects you or another.

**[[Disguise Self (Spell)|Disguise Self]]****:** Changes your appearance.

**[[Disguise Ship (Spell)|Disguise Ship]]****:** Disguises a ship.

**[[Disguise Undead (Spell)|Disguise Undead]]****:** Change appearance of one corporeal undead.

**[[Disguise Weapon (Spell)|Disguise Weapon]]****:** Changes one weapon’s appearance.

**[[Disintegrate (Spell)|Disintegrate]]****:** Reduces one creature or object to dust.

**[[Disjoin (Spell)|Disjoin]]****:** Choose a single magical effect or magic item to disjoin.

**[[Disk of Solar Vengeance (Spell)|Disk of Solar Vengeance]]****:** Gain cold resistance 5 and do 1d6+1 fire damage if struck in melee.

**[[Dismissal (Spell)|Dismissal]]****:** Forces a creature to return to native plane.

**[[Disobedience (Spell)|Disobedience]]****:** Subject is shielded from mind control.

**[[Dispel Chaos (Spell)|Dispel Chaos]]****:** +4 against attacks by chaotic creatures.

**[[Dispel Cold (Spell)|Dispel Cold]]****:** Cancels cold spells and effects.

**[[Dispel Evil (Spell)|Dispel Evil]]****:** +4 against attacks by evil creatures.

**[[Dispel Fire (Spell)|Dispel Fire]]****:** Cancels fire spells and effects.

**[[Dispel Fog (Spell)|Dispel Fog]]****:** Cancels natural and magical fogs in affected area.

**[[Dispel Good (Spell)|Dispel Good]]****:** +4 against attacks by good creatures.

**[[Dispel Law (Spell)|Dispel Law]]****:** +4 against attacks by lawful creatures.

**[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|Dispel Magic]]****:** Cancels one magical spell or effect.

**[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|Dispel Magic, Greater]]****:** As *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, but with multiple targets.

**[[Dispel Possession (Spell)|Dispel Possession]]****:** Forces possessing creature out of its host body.

**[[Dispel Silence (Spell)|Dispel Silence]]****:** As *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]**,* but only works against effects that create an area of silence.

**[[Dispel Taint (Spell)|Dispel Taint]]****:** +4 bonus against attacks.

**[[Dispel Ward (Spell)|Dispel Ward]]****:** As *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, but affects only wards.

**[[Dispel Water (Spell)|Dispel Water]]****:** Cancels water spells and effects or dismisses water creatures.

**[[Dispelling Breath (Spell)|Dispelling Breath]]****:** Your breath weapon acts as a targeted *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]* to all creatures in its area.

**[[Dispelling Screen (Spell)|Dispelling Screen]]****:** Targeted *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]* on any creatures and unattended items, +10 max on caster level check.

**[[Dispelling Screen, Greater (Spell)|Dispelling Screen, Greater]]****:** Targeted *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]* on any creatures and unattended items, +20 max on caster level check.

**[[Dispelling Touch (Spell)|Dispelling Touch]]****:** Dispel one magical effect on touched subject.

**[[Displacement (Spell)|Displacement]]****:** Attacks miss subject 50% of the time.

**[[Displacer Form (Spell)|Displacer Form]]****:** You change into displacer beast, gain some abilities.

**[[Disquietude (Spell)|Disquietude]]****:** Subject avoids physical contact with others.

**[[Disrupt Causality (Spell)|Disrupt Causality]]****:** Target suffers -6 penalty to all attacks, checks and saves.

**[[Disrupt Ectoplasm (Spell)|Disrupt Ectoplasm]]****:** Deals 1d6 damage to ectoplasm.

**[[Disrupt Undead (Spell)|Disrupt Undead]]****:** Deals 1d6 damage to one undead.

**[[Disrupt Undead, Greater (Spell)|Disrupt Undead, Greater]]****:** As *[[Disrupt Undead (Spell)|disrupt undead]]*, but 1d8 damage/level.

**[[Disrupting Hand (Spell)|Disrupting Hand]]****:** Hand disrupts opponent’s spellcasting.

**[[Disrupting Weapon (Spell)|Disrupting Weapon]]****:** Melee weapon destroys undead.

**Dissolution <sup>M</sup>:** Cause a tiny item to vanish from existence.

**[[Dissonant Chant (Spell)|Dissonant Chant]]****:** Concentration checks more difficult within area of spell.

**[[Dissonant Chord (Spell)|Dissonant Chord]]****:** Deal 1d8/2 levels sonic damage in 10-ft. burst.

**[[Distilled Joy (Spell)|Distilled Joy]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Creates ambrosia.

**[[Distort Speech (Spell)|Distort Speech]]****:** Subject’s speech is 50% unintelligible, so it might miscast spells.

**[[Distort Summons (Spell)|Distort Summons]]****:** Creates area where only evil creatures can be summoned.

**[[Distort Weapon (Spell)|Distort Weapon]]****:** Weapon strike true against good foes; any threat of a critical hit against a good foe is automatically confirmed.

**[[Distract (Spell)|Distract]]****:** Subjects take –4 on Concentration and [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (3.5 Listen, Search, and Spot).

**[[Distract Assailant (Spell)|Distract Assailant]]****:** One creature is [[Flat-Footed|flat-footed]] for 1 round.

**Distracting Cacophony:** Noise makes it difficult to cast.

**[[Distracting Ray (Spell)|Distracting Ray]]****:** Ray forces spellcaster to make Concentration check.

**[[Distracting Shadows (Spell)|Distracting Shadows]]****:** –5 penalty on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks in a 20-ft.-radius spread.

**Distressing Tone:** Sound sickens 1d4 creatures.

**[[Divest Essentia (Spell)|Divest Essentia]]****:** Target’s essentia becomes uninvested.

**[[Divination Spells|Divination]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Provides useful advice for specific proposed actions.

**[[Divine Agility (Spell)|Divine Agility]]****:** Subject gains +10 to Dexterity for 1 round/level.

**[[Divine Blessing (Spell)|Divine Blessing]]****:** Gain a +2 luck bonus to AC.

**[[Divine Favor (Spell)|Divine Favor]]****:** You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls.

**[[Divine Insight (Spell)|Divine Insight]]****:** You gain insight bonus of 5 + caster level on one single skill check.

**[[Divine Inspiration (Spell)|Divine Inspiration]]****:** Target gains +3 sacred bonus on attack rolls against evil creatures.

**[[Divine Interdiction (Spell)|Divine Interdiction]]****:** Turn/rebuke attempts fail within the area.

**[[Divine Light (Spell)|Divine Light]]****:** Illuminate undead, negate channel resistance, and inflict –2 penalty vs. positive energy.

**[[Divine Power (Spell)|Divine Power]]****:** You gain attack bonuses and 1 hp/level.

**[[Divine Power Surge (Spell)|Divine Power Surge]]****:** Target gains an enhancement bonus to its Str equal to twice your caster level (max. +10), then [[Fatigued|fatigued]] for 1d4 minutes.

**[[Divine Presence (Spell)|Divine Presence]]****:** Gain a +5, +10, or +15 bonus on [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks against those who don’t worship your deity.

**[[Divine Protection (Feat)|Divine Protection]]****:** Allies gain +1 to AC, saves.

**[[Divine Retaliation (Spell)|Divine Retaliation]]****:** Weapon appears and strikes those who attack you.

**[[Divine Retribution (Spell)|Divine Retribution]]****:** Any creature that harms you takes 1d6/caster level (max. 15d6) points of damage (half energy and half divine) 

     and 1d4 points of ability damage based on the deity selected.

**[[Divine Sacrifice (Spell)|Divine Sacrifice]]****:** Sacrifice hit points for a damage bonus.

**[[Divine Transfer (Spell)|Divine Transfer]]****:** Transfer hit points and give DR/evil to target creature.

**[[Divine Vessel (Spell)|Divine Vessel]]****:** Change into a huge, otherworldly creature.

## Dk-Do
**[[Dolorous Blow (Spell)|Dolorous Blow]]****:** Weapon’s threat range is doubled and threats are automatically confirmed.

**[[Dolorous Damage (Spell)|Dolorous Damage]]****:** Increases a weapon’s crit multiplier by one.

**[[Dolorous Motes (Spell)|Dolorous Motes]]****:** Creates clouds of flickering light (1 10-ft. cube/level) that dazes creatures.

**[[Dominate Animal (Spell)|Dominate Animal]]****:** One animal obeys your silent mental commands and orders.

**[[Dominate Living Construct (Spell)|Dominate Living Construct]]****:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*, but affecting a living construct.

**[[Dominate Monster (Spell)|Dominate Monster]]****:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*, but any creature.

**[[Dominate Person (Spell)|Dominate Person]]****:** Controls humanoid telepathically.

**[[Dominate Person or Ghost (Spell)|Dominate Person or Ghost]]****:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*, but also affecting ghosts.

**[[Dominate Vermin (Spell)|Dominate Vermin]]****:** Subject vermin obeys psychic commands.

**Dongun Shaper's Touch:** Temporarily reshape nonmagical materials.

**[[Doom (Spell)|Doom]]****:** One subject takes –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

**[[Doom of the Seas (Spell)|Doom of the Seas]]:** Summons a fiendish [[Kraken (Bestiary PF1)|kraken]] under your command.

**[[Doom Scarabs (Spell)|Doom Scarabs]]****:** Scarab swarm deals 1d6/2 levels, gives you temporary hit points.

**[[Doomtide (Spell)|Doomtide]]****:** Black mist obscures sight, dazes those inside.

**[[Door of Decay (Spell)|Door of Decay]]****:** Move instantly from one willing or controlled undead to another.

**[[Doorway to Elsewhere (Spell)|Doorway to Elsewhere]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Creates a doorway to another location.

**[[Doppelganger Transformation (Spell)|Doppelganger Transformation]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** You gain physical and mental bonuses.

**[[Doublespeak (Spell)|Doublespeak]]****:** Subjects' speech is masked from listeners.

**[[Doublestrike Arrow (Spell)|Doublestrike Arrow]]****:** One arrow or bolt strikes two targets within 30 feet of each other.

**[[Downdarft (Spell)|Downdraft]]****:** Flying creatures knocked down.

## Dp-Dt
**[[Draconic Malice (Spell)|Draconic Malice]]****:** You surround yourself with a palpable aura of draconic fear and dread; living creatures within this aura that are normally immune to fear 

     or mind-affecting abilities lose those immunities against your spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities that create fear effects.

**[[Draconic Might (Spell)|Draconic Might]]****:** Gain +5 to Str, Con, Cha; +4 natural armor; immunity to magic sleep effects and paralysis.

**[[Draconic Reservoir (Spell)|Draconic Reservoir]]****:** Subject can absorb energy damage and enhance melee attacks with it.

**[[Draconic Suppression (Spell)|Draconic Suppression]]:** Stop a dragon from using its breath weapon along with reducing its magical prowess.

**[[Dragon Ally (Spell)|Dragon Ally]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** As *[[Dragon Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser dragon ally]]*, but up to 15 HD.

**[[Dragon Ally, Greater (Spell)|Dragon Ally, Greater]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** As *[[Dragon Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser dragon ally]]*, but up to 21 HD.

**[[Dragon Ally, Lesser (Spell)|Dragon Ally, Lesser]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Exchange services with a 9 HD dragon.

**[[Dragon Blight (Spell)|Dragon Blight]]****:** 20-ft. radius; 1d8/2 caster levels damage to dragonblood creatures or 1d6/level damage to dragons; stuns for 1d4 rounds.

**[[Dragon Cloud (Spell)|Dragon Cloud]]****:** Calls forth an elemental spirit that assumes a cloudy, dragonlike form.

**[[Dragon's Breath (Spell)|Dragon's Breath]]****:** Gives you a dragon’s breath weapon.

**[[Dragon's Form (Spell)|Dragon’s Form]]****:** You take the form of a young adult red dragon.

**[[Dragonblood Affinity (Spell)|Dragonblood Affinity]]****:** Grants +2 bonus on all saves, checks, attacks, and damage rolls to one dragon or dragonblood creature/level.

**[[Dragonblood Beast (Spell)|Dragonblood Beast]]****:** Target animal gets improved bite attack, natural armor, wings and fly speed.

**[[Dragonblood Spell-Pact (Spell)|Dragonblood Spell-Pact]]****:** Allows willing dragonblood creatures to trade spells.

**[[Dragoncall (Spell)|Dragoncall]]****:** Dragon compels 1 intelligent creature to come to his location.

**[[Dragoneye Rune (Spell)|Dragoneye Rune]]****:** Create an invisible draconic mark on an object or creature.

**[[Dragonmark Demesne (Spell)|Dragonmark Demesne]]****:** Creates hemispherical shelter for you and 25 creatures.

**[[Dragonmark Shield (Spell)|Dragonmark Shield]]****:** Intangible shield blocks *magic missiles*, provides bonus to AC, bonus on Reflex saves.

**[[Dragonmark Symbol (Spell)|Dragonmark Symbol]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune nauseates nearby creatures.

**[[Dragonmark Whip (Spell)|Dragonmark Whip]]****:** Whip deals 1d8 +1/level damage or channels touch spell with attack.

**[[Dragonmark Whip, Greater (Spell)|Dragonmark Whip, Greater]]****:** As *[[Dragonmark Whip (Spell)|dragonmark whip]]* but deals more damage, channels higher-level spells.

**[[Dragonmarked Weapon (Spell)|Dragonmarked Weapon]]****:** Weapon deals +1d6 damage to dragonmarked foes, hardness increases by 50%.

**[[Dragonmarked Weapon, Greater]]****:** Weapon deals +2d6 damage to dragonmarked foes, hardness is doubled.

**[[Dragonshape (Spell)|Dragonshape]]****:** You take on the form and abilities of a Huge red dragon.

**[[Dragonshape, Least (Spell)|Dragonshape, Least]]****:** Take the form of a pseudodragon.

**[[Dragonshape, Lesser (Spell)|Dragonshape, Lesser]]****:** Take the form of a Large red dragon.

**[[Dragonsight (Spell)|Dragonsight]]****:** Gain low-light vision, darkvision, and blindsense.

**[[Dragonskin, Lesser (Spell)|Dragonskin, Lesser]]****:** You gain a bonus to natural armor plus energy resistance 10.

**Dragonvoice:** Emulate the vocal inflections of dragons.

**Dread Bolt:** Harm and possibly sicken good creatures.

**[[Dread Word (Spell)|Dread Word]]****:** 1d3 Cha drain on one target.

**[[Dreaded Form of the Eye Tyrant (Spell)|Dreaded Form of the Eye Tyrant]]****:** You take the form of a beholder.

**[[Dream (Domain)|Dream]]****:** Sends message to anyone sleeping.

**[[Dream, Minor (Spell)|Dream, Minor]]** **<sup>R</sup>:** As the *[[Dream (Domain)|dream]]* spell, except delivering a shorter message.

**[[Dream Casting (Spell)|Dream Casting]]****:** Alter subject’s dreams to produce desired effect.

**[[Dream Image (Spell)|Dream Image]]** **<sup>MX</sup>:** Create a dream duplicate of yourself in an adjacent area in the waking  world.

**[[Dream Lock (Spell)|Dream Lock]]****:** Target creature cannot differentiate dream from reality, and is [[Dazed|dazed]] or [[Shaken|shaken]].

**[[Dream Lock, Mass (Spell)|Dream Lock, Mass]]****:** As *[[Dream Lock (Spell)|dream lock]]*, but multiple targets.

**Dream Shield:** Ward a target’s mind to protect them while [[Unconscious|unconscious]].

**[[Dream Sight (Spell)|Dream Sight]]****:** Your spirit can leave your body and explore for 1 minute/level.

**[[Dream Spirit (Spell)|Dream Spirit]]****:** Incorporeal manifestation attacks your opponents.

**[[Dream Walk (Spell)|Dream Walk]]****:** As many as eight subjects enter a dreamscape.

**[[Dreaming Puppet (Spell)|Dreaming Puppet]]****:** Control the physical body of a sleeping creature.

**[[Dridershape (Spell)|Dridershape]]****:** You take on the form and abilities of a drider.

**[[Drifts of the Shalm (Spell)|Drifts of the Shalm]]****:** Create difficult terrain made of snow, leaves, or ash.

**[[Drown (Spell)|Drown]]****:** Subject immediately begins to drown.

**[[Drown, Mass (Spell)|Drown, Mass]]****:** As *[[Drown (Spell)|drown]]*, but affects 1/level subjects.

**[[Drug Resistance (Spell)|Drug Resistance]]****:** Subject is immune to addiction.

**[[Drums of War (Spell)|Drums of War]]****:** Enemies take –2 penalty on attacks and saves.

## Du-Dz
**[[Duelward (Spell)|Duelward]]****:** +4 on [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] checks, counterspell as an immediate action.

**[[Dune Tomb (Spell)|Dune Tomb]]****:** Target up to one creature/level, all targeted creatures who fail sink down into the dune.

**[[Dungeonsight (Spell)|Dungeonsight]]****:** You receive a clear and memorable view of the layout of chambers, barriers, and connecting passages within the area of effect.

**Duplicate Familiar:** Create a duplicate of your familiar.

**[[Duplicate Self (Spell)|Duplicate Self]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Creates an exact duplicate of you that you control.

**Dust Form:** You become an incorporeal creature of dust for a short period of time.

**[[Dust of Twilight (Spell)|Dust of Twilight]]:** Black particles extinguish light sources.

**[[Dust to Dust (Spell)|Dust to Dust]]****:** Disintegrate undead with your ray attack.

**[[Dweomer of Transference (Spell)|Dweomer of Transference]]****:** Convert spellcasting into psionic power points.

**[[Dweomer Vortex (Spell)|Dweomer Vortex]]****:** Create a spinning cone of arcane energy that can negate spells or spell-like abilities it comes in contact with.

**[[Dweomer Vortex, Greater (Spell)|Dweomer Vortex, Greater]]****:** Create a spinning cone of arcane energy that can negate up to 9th-level spells or spell-like abilities.

**[[Dweomerdisk (Spell)|Dweomerdisk]]****:** Conjures disk that can store a single spell of up to 5th level and release it when broken.

**[[Dweomerdoom (Spell)|Dweomerdoom]]****:** You counterspell an opponent’s spell or spell-like ability before it is even cast.

**[[Dweomerstrike (Spell)|Dweomerstrike]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 1d10 points of damager per two caster levels (max. 10d10).

**[[Dweomerstrike, Greater (Spell)|Dweomerstrike, Greater]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 1d12 points of damager per two caster levels (max. 10d12).
